verses.verse: And Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> either <S%H376><s%> of them his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in it <S%H2004><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it <S%H7126><s%>, and offered strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which he commanded them not <S%H6680><s%>.
And there went out <S%H3318><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> them <S%H4191><s%>, and they died before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, This is it that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them that come near <S%H7138><s%> me <S%H6440><s%>, and before all the people <S%H5971><s%> I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%>. And Aaron <S%H175><s%> held his peace <S%H1826><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7126><s%>, Come near, carry <S%H5375><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.
So they went near <S%H7126><s%>, and carried <S%H5375><s%> them in their coats <S%H3801><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>; as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Uncover <S%H6544><s%> not your heads <S%H7218><s%>, neither tear <S%H6533><s%> your clothes <S%H899><s%>; lest you die <S%H4191><s%>, and lest wrath <S%H7107><s%> come upon all the people <S%H5712><s%>: but let your brothers <S%H251><s%>, the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, bewail <S%H1058><s%> the burning <S%H8316><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has kindled <S%H8313><s%>.

And you shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest you die <S%H4191><s%>: for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is upon you <S%H6213><s%>. And they did according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Do not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, you <S%H1121><s%>, nor your sons with you <S%H935><s%>, when you go into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest you die <S%H4191><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>:
And that you may put difference <S%H914><s%> between holy <S%H6944><s%> and unholy <S%H2455><s%>, and between unclean <S%H2931><s%> and clean <S%H2889><s%>;

And that you may teach <S%H3384><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto them by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> that were left <S%H3498><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> the food offering <S%H4503><s%> that remains <S%H3498><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> it without yeast <S%H4682><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>: for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>:

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, because it is your due <S%H2706><s%>, and your sons <S%H1121><s%>' due <S%H2706><s%>, of the sacrifices <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: for so I am commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; you <S%H1121><s%>, and your sons, and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you for they be your due <S%H2706><s%>, and your sons <S%H1121><s%>' due <S%H2706><s%>, which are given <S%H5414><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

The heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> and the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> shall they bring <S%H935><s%> with the offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%> of the fat <S%H2459><s%>, to wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and it shall be your <S%H1121><s%>, and your sons' with you <S%H2706><s%>, by a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> diligently <S%H1875><s%> sought <S%H1875><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and <S%H8313><s%>, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry <S%H7107><s%> with Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> which were left <S%H3498><s%> alive <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Why have you not eaten <S%H398><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, seeing it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, and God has given <S%H5414><s%> it you to carry <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

Behold <S%H2005><s%>, the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it was not brought <S%H935><s%> in inside <S%H6441><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H398><s%>: you should indeed have eaten <S%H398><s%> it in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6680><s%>, as I commanded.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Behold <S%H3117><s%>, this day have they offered <S%H7126><s%> their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> and their burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and such things have happened <S%H7122><s%> me <S%H398><s%>: and if I had eaten the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>, should it have been accepted <S%H3190><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3190><s%>, he was content.
